Articles.Content:
I don't know why this happens, but almost every time I exit the VAB, SPH, or Tracking Station my game crashes and I have to restart it. Please help, and if anybody else has this issue please post on this thread.

System Specifications:

3.2 GHz Dual-Core Intel Pentium D

4 GB RAM

2 GB VRAM

32-bit OS

Windows Vista Home Premium SP 2

Here are the links to the files:

crash.dmp: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BxzmcAOOfH5FVzJDY0lGS0JuR2M

error.log: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BxzmcAOOfH5FYk8tbDctdjkweFk

report.ini: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BxzmcAOOfH5FR3g0V25BYlM1b1k

Rhendox,

You need to allow shared access for these google docs. We can't read them otherwise.

Welcome to the forums!

Cheers,

~Claw

Here are the links that allow you to view the file:
crash.dmp: [url]https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BxzmcAOOfH5FVzJDY0lGS0JuR2M/view?usp=sharing[/url]
error.log: [url]https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BxzmcAOOfH5FYk8tbDctdjkweFk/view?usp=sharing[/url]
report.ini: [url]https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BxzmcAOOfH5FR3g0V25BYlM1b1k/view?usp=sharing[/url]

Hi Rhendox, can you please also upload the output_log.txt after this occurs, it is in KSP_Data.

Your error.log shows you to be running out of memory, so please try lowering the texture quality in KSP.
